segments.text: Why should I buy this MD player ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it has a lithium battery that lasts for 24 hours and it has a 160 second anti-skip mode for when you're playing sports .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Using MP3 mode , you can download about 10 hours of music from either your CD player , or your computer's hard disk onto one mini-disk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can choose from several play modes , or you can use the full-spectrum equalization , 3 D mode and Mega Bass features . We rec-ommend using it with the studio monitor headphones .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's ultra-compact , it has a brushed , titanium metal body and a rubber shock-proof , weather-proof case with a belt clip .
segments.speaker: S2
